results.name: From the game of Mousetrap.
reference: R. K. Guy and R. J. Nowakowski, "Mousetrap," in D. Miklos, V. T. Sos and T. Szonyi, eds., Combinatorics, Paul Erdős is Eighty. Bolyai Society Math. Studies, Vol. 1, pp. 193-206, 1993.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: Arthur Cayley, On the game of Mousetrap, Quarterly Journal of Pure and Applied Mathematics 15 (1878), p. 8-10.
R. K. Guy and R. J. Nowakowski, Mousetrap, Preprint, Feb 10 1993 [Annotated scanned copy]
Adolph Steen, Some formulas respecting the game of Mousetrap, Quarterly Journal of Pure and Applied Mathematics 15 (1878), p. 230-241.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
